Module wgu.inventoryfxmlapp
Package controller

Class MainFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddPartFormController, ModifyPartFormController
public class MainFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the main form of the application.

This class is responsible for handling all user interactions on the main form, including navigating to add or modify parts/products, deleting parts/products, and searching through parts/products.

    • checkValues

      public static boolean checkValues(int min, int max, int inStock, Double price)
      Validates input values for parts and products.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value.
      max - The maximum value.
      inStock - The stock level.
      price - The price.
      Returns:
      true if the values are valid, false otherwise.

    • onAddPartButton

      public void onAddPartButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the Add Part button is clicked.

      This method transitions the user to the Add Part form.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the transition.

    • onModifyPart

      public void onModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the Modify Part button is clicked.

      Transitions the user to the Modify Part form for the selected part. Displays a warning if no part is selected.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the transition.

    • onDeletePart

      public void onDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event when the Delete Part button is clicked.

      Prompts the user for confirmation before deleting the selected part from the inventory.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.

    • onSearchPart

      public void onSearchPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles part search functionality.

      Searches for parts based on the given input in the part search text field.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.

    • onSearchProduct

      public void onSearchProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles product search functionality.

      Searches for products based on the given input in the product search text field.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.

    • onAddProduct

      public void onAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the Add Product button is clicked.

      Transitions the user to the Add Product form.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the transition.

    • onDeleteProduct

      public void onDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event when the Delete Product button is clicked.

      Prompts the user for confirmation before deleting the selected product from the inventory.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.

    • onModifyProduct

      public void onModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the event when the Modify Product button is clicked.

      Transitions the user to the Modify Product form for the selected product. Displays a warning if no product is selected.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the transition.

    • onExitButton

      Handles the application exit.

      Closes the application when the Exit button is clicked.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.
